itemizedlist.title: Supported Guests
itemizedlist.para: oVirt is presently tested with the following virtualized guest operating systems, results with other guest operating systems may vary:

listitem.para: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 3 (32 bit and 64 bit)
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4 (32 bit and 64 bit)
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5 (32 bit and 64 bit)
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 (32 bit and 64 bit)
Windows XP Service Pack 3 and newer (32 bit only)
Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 2 and newer (32 bit and 64 bit)
